definition: Hua Luogeng (1910-1985), Chinese number theorist
magnificent/splendid/flowery
old variant of 花[hua1]/flower
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
abbr. for China
gauze/to collect/to gather/to catch/to sift
surname Luo
age/seventh of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/seventh in order/letter "G" or Roman "VII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 255°/hepta

sentences.english: Hua's double act was close contact with the engineering practice.
sentences.chinese: 华罗庚的“双法”与工程实践是密切联系的。

sentences.english: Hua Luogeng is a great mathematician.
sentences.chinese: 华罗庚是一位伟大的数学家。

sentences.english: Hua Luogeng came up with the woman at last. He told her the whole thing.
sentences.chinese: 终于追上了那位妇女，华罗庚讲述了事情的经过。

sentences.english: The woman was moved by Hua. She gave the scratch paper to him.
sentences.chinese: 那位妇女被他感动了，把草纸还给了华罗庚。

sentences.english: Hua Luogeng liked maths even from childhood.
sentences.chinese: 华罗庚从小就非常喜欢数学。

sentences.english: Once, his father asked him to keep an eye on their family's cotton shop.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，父亲让华罗庚照看家里的棉花店。

sentences.english: He collaborated with the famous Chinese scientist—Hua Luogeng on the method of optimality.
sentences.chinese: 曾与我国著名科学家华罗庚共创优选法。

sentences.english: Hua Luogeng was a well-known scientist.
sentences.chinese: 华罗庚是一位著名的科学家。

definition: Su Buqing (1902-2003), Chinese mathematician

Qian Sanqiang
Qian Xuesen (1911-2009), Chinese scientist and aeronautical engineer
Zhu Kezhen (1890-1974), Chinese metereologist and geologist
Li Siguang (1889-1971), Mongol-born, Japanese trained geologist, prominent in early PRC oil exploration
Shing-Tung Yau (1949-), Chinese-American mathematician, Fields medalist in 1982
Zhao Zhongyao (1902-1998), Chinese pioneer nuclear physicist
Lin Chia-Chiao (1916-2013), Chinese-American physicist, astronomer and applied mathematician
see 居禮夫人|居礼夫人[Ju1 li3 Fu1 ren5]
Guo Yonghuai (1909-1968), Chinese aviation pioneer
Samuel C. C. Ting (1936-), American physicist, 1976 Nobel Prize laureate in physics
Feng Youlan (1895-1990), distinguished Chinese philosopher
Chen-Ning Franklin Yang (1922-), theoretical physicist, co-developer of Yang-Mills gauge theory, 1957 Nobel laureate
